japanese:
あ、ミュージアムショップがある。
ちょっと見ていかない？
translation:
Oh, there's a museum shop.
Wanna take a look?

japanese:
三玖ご希望のイルカショーまで、
まだ時間あるわよね？
translation:
We still have time
until Miku's dolphin show, right?

japanese: うん、大丈夫。
translation: Yeah, we do.

japanese: お土産になりそうなものも探してみよーっと。
translation:
I'm gonna try to find something
that could make a good souvenir.

japanese: ジンベエザメの実物大ぬいぐるみってあるかな？
translation:
I wonder if they have a life-sized stuffed toy
of a whale shark?

japanese: 四葉？　さすがに実物大は止めましょう？
translation:
Yotsuba?
Let's not go for life-sized ones, shall we?

japanese: つーか、そんなにでかいのはないと思うぞ。
translation: Well, I don't think they'll be that big.

japanese:
あ、これ可愛い。
見てフータロー、お弁当箱。
translation:
Ah, this is cute.
Look, Futaro, it's a bento box in the shape of a fish.

japanese:
魚の形になってるのか。
さすが、水族館で売ってるだけはあるな。
translation:
Really? That's pretty neat,
but I guess that's expected
from a gift shop in an aquarium.

japanese:
こっちはジンベエザメだな。
デフォルメされてるが特徴がよく出てる。
translation:
This one's a whale shark. It's a little stylized,
but you can still see the distinctive features.

japanese: こういう可愛いの、使えばよかったかな。
translation: I should've used a bento box this cute.

japanese:
でも、フータローがこんなの持ってたら
ちょっと面白いことになってたかも。
translation:
But if you had brought a bento box like that,
it would have been kind of funny, don't you think?

japanese:
……もしかして、
俺に弁当を作ってきてくれた時の話か？
translation:
...Is this about the time when you made me
bento boxes every morning?

japanese: うん。
translation: Yes.

japanese:
毎朝、学校で渡してくれたよな。
嬉しかったが、作るの大変だったんじゃないか？
translation:
You handed them to me at school every morning.
It made me happy, but wasn't it hard making 'em everyday?

japanese:
ううん、すごく楽しくて
大変なんて少しも思わなかった。
translation:
No, it was really fun.
I never thought it was hard at all.

japanese:
だって……フータローと恋人になったら
作ってあげたいって、ずっと思ってたから。
translation:
I mean... I've always wanted to make one
for you, Futaro, since we started dating.

japanese: そ、そうか……。
translation: R-really...

japanese:
いまでもちゃんと覚えてるぞ？
初めての弁当はオーソドックスに卵焼き、
ささみの照り焼きにきんぴらゴボウ――
translation:
I still remember what was in the first bento you
made for me, you know? It was orthodox, with an
omelette, teriyaki chicken, and braised burdock root...

japanese: よく覚えてるね。
translation: You remember well.

japanese:
当たり前だろ。
……俺のためにっていう、
お前の努力がにじみ出てたし。
translation:
Of course.
...Well it was quite obvious how much effort you put into it for me.

japanese: ……うん。
translation: ...Yeah.

japanese:
し、しかし、いま思えば全体的に茶色かった！
彩りについては厳しい評価になるな！
translation:
B-but, looking back on it now,
the ingredients you used were all brown!
I would give it a poor rating for the color scheme!

japanese: そこまで覚えてなくていいのに。
translation: You don't have to remember all that.

japanese:
最初は作るのに精一杯で、
彩りとか考える余裕なかった。
translation:
I was just doing my best to make it,
so I didn't have time to think about colors.

japanese:
だが、何度も作ってくれるうちに
どんどん上達していったのには驚いたぞ？
translation:
Yet, I was still surprised to see how much you had improved
every time you made them for me.

japanese:
練習、たくさんしたから。
フータローに美味しいお弁当を食べて欲しくて。
translation:
I practiced a lot because I wanted you
to eat my delicious bento, Futaro.

japanese:
それに、自分でも上手くなってるのがわかって、
ますます楽しくなったんだ。
translation:
And, I also enjoyed it more and more
as I realized that I was getting better at it.

japanese:
俺もだ。
三玖の成長を見守ってる気分だった。
translation:
Me too.
I felt like I watching over your progress.

japanese: 私、まだまだ成長中だけどね？
translation: I'm still improving, though.

japanese:
おう。
進学先でどれだけ腕を磨くか期待してるぜ？
translation:
Yeah. I'm looking forward
to seeing how much you'll improve at the culinary school.

japanese:
しかし、あの弁当の件で
クラスのやつらに散々からかわれたなぁ。
translation:
However, I was teased pretty bad by our classmates
because of the bento incident.

japanese:
そうだね。
私たちが付き合ってるって、
あれでみんなに知られちゃったし。
translation:
That's right. Everyone found out
that we were dating because of it.

japanese:
あれは恥ずかしかった。
あいつら、ここぞとばかりに囃し立てやがって。
translation:
That was really embarrassing.
They were making fun of me when I felt the most vulnerable.

japanese:
フータロー、すぐにムキになるから。
だから余計にからかわれるんだよ。
translation:
Futaro, you always gets worked up so quickly.
It makes you an easy target for teasing.

japanese:
そ、そうは言ってもな。
無視するのも変だろ。
translation:
B-but even so.
It's weird to just ignore them.

japanese: ……私は、ちょっとだけ嬉しかったけどな。
translation: ...Though I have to admit, I was kind of happy.

japanese:
またフータローにお弁当を作ってあげられるの、
いつになるかな。
translation:
I wonder when I'll be able to make another bento
for you, Futaro.

japanese: それは……わからんが……。
translation: I don't know...when that will be, though...

japanese:
まあ、メリットもあったな。
周りに知らせておけたし。
translation:
Well, there were benefits, too.
We were able to let everyone know.

japanese: メリット？
translation: Benefits?

japanese:
あー、いや、その……
三玖も他の男子が突然告白してきたら困るだろ？
translation:
Oh, well, umm...
If another guy suddenly confessed to you, Miku,
it would be a problem, right?

japanese:
知らせておくって……
私が、えっと、フータローの……ってこと？
translation:
Letting them know...
That, I'm, um, your... Is what you mean?

japanese: ……俺がお前のってことでもあるぞ？
translation: ...Or that, I'm yours?

japanese: う、うん……。
translation: O-okay...

japanese:
またフータローにお弁当を作ってあげられるの、
いつになるかな。
translation:
I wonder when I'll be able to make another bento
for you, Futaro.

japanese: それは……わからんが……。
translation: I don't know...when that will be, though...

japanese: おかげで彩りが増した。
translation: Because of you, it became more colorful.

japanese: 彩り？　お弁当……じゃないよね？
translation: Colorful? You're not talking about the...bento, right?

japanese:
高校生活の彩りだ。
あれがきっかけで、
よく話すようになった奴もいるからな。
translation:
The colorful high school life.
Thanks to that,
there are people I talk to a lot more now.

japanese: そう考えれば悪いことじゃない。
translation: If you look at it that way, it's not a bad thing.

japanese:
……そっか。
青春をエンジョイってこと？
translation:
...I see.
Enjoying your youth, huh?

japanese: ま、まあ、そういうことだ。
translation: W-well, yeah, that's one way to put it.

japanese:
これも三玖と一緒だから経験できたんだ。
ありがとな。
translation:
I was able to experience this
because I was together with you, Miku. Thanks.

japanese:
ううん……。
私だって、フータローと一緒だから
経験できたことがたくさんある。
translation:
No...
I've been able to experience so much
because I'm with you, Futaro.

japanese: ありがと、フータロー。
translation: Thank you.

japanese:
またフータローにお弁当を作ってあげられるの、
いつになるかな。
translation:
I wonder when I'll be able to make another bento
for you, Futaro.

japanese: それは……わからんが……。
translation: I don't know...when that will be, though...

japanese: でも将来は……。
translation: But, in the future...

japanese:
また毎日、作るよ。
美味しいお弁当。
translation:
I'll make them for you every day again.
Delicious bento.

japanese: （それってつまり……）
translation: (In other words...)

japanese: ああ、楽しみにしておく。
translation: Yeah, I'll be looking forward to it.

japanese: 私、頑張るから。
translation: I'll do my best.

japanese:
そ、そろそろ時間だな！
イルカショーが始まるし、行こうぜ！
translation:
W-well, it's about time!
The dolphin show is starting,
so let's go!

japanese: うん……。
translation: Yeah...
